page.title: 11COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {COMMUNICATIONS}- Many houses have door bells and burglar alarms. {SATELLITE DISHES}- At{Baugh Farm}we saw two satellite dishes about 2m in diameter in a right-angled position for receiving information from satellites at the speed of light. {VISUAL COMMUNICATIONS}- We saw many different examples:{road signs, {buildings with advertisements}and lots of{posters and adverts}outside the shops including{billboards}with newspaper headlines. On buildings we saw one or two window displays and publicity for local events. The{road signs}that we saw were concentrated on the busier roads to help prevent accidents. On the minor roads there were traffic warnings and junction indicators. Near schools were flashing yellow warnings to show drivers that children were crossing.
